# JAXdsp

Fast, differentiable audio processors on the CPU or GPU.
Built with [JAX](https://github.com/google/jax).

## Server

```shell
$ cd server
$ python server.py
```

## Client

```shell
$ cd client
$ npm ci
$ npm run build:dev
```

## App

```shell
$ cd app
$ npm ci
$ npm start
```

### [Trello](https://trello.com/b/HftUVYY5/jaxdsp)
